welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Ana, a charming city known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant arts scene. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at John Wayne Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all air freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and houses a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all general aviation and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all cargo and freight flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Torrance Airport caters to business and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network by selecting ONT Free WiFi and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Cable Airport provides services for private and corporate aircraft, including fueling and maintenance.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
